step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows relatively stable. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in this position.
Your shoulder and elbow movements are good. Focus on keeping your wrists more aligned with your forearms.
Excellent work with your shoulders and elbows! For the next repetitions, try to make a tighter fist and squeeze your shoulder blades together more.
Your shoulders and elbows are moving well. Pay attention to keeping your wrists straighter as you extend your arms overhead.
Good job relaxing and exhaling. Try to straighten your wrists more as you relax your arms overhead.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter, especially when making a fist and extending your arms. This helps maximize the benefits for your arm strength and lymph drainage.
